page.title: 06Tockwith Working Mothers.
page.content: This survey concerns mothers only, providing they are not head of household, in which case they fall into Job Survey 1. 41% of the mothers hold jobs, mostly day time jobs. 50% work part-time. They travel on average 18 miles a day to and from work, tending to work nearer home than the heads of households. 64% have a second car in the family, which they use to drive to work. Most working mothers have children at the village school. The majority of pre-school children of working mothers are looked after by local registered child minders.
